product_name: Sugoi Firewall 180 Zip Top - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The women's Sugoi Firewall 180 Zip top lets you focus on your workout instead of the weather. Lightweight, stretch soft-shell fabric features a breathable polyurethane laminate to resist wind and water. Durable Water Repellent finish fends off light rain showers and snow. Moisture-wicking interior helps prevent clamminess. Stretch-knit sleeves provide a non-constricting fit. Thumbholes secure sleeves over hands for warmth. Zippered sleeve pocket holds ID, key or media player. Reflective accents on the women's Sugoi Firewall 180 Zip jacket help keep you visible. Pro fit offers a next-to-skin fit for excellent heat retention. Closeout.
short_description: The women's Sugoi Firewall 180 Zip top lets you focus on your workout instead of the weather.
